card.name: Adaptive Automaton
card.property: As Adaptive Automaton enters, choose a creature type. Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types. Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

card.name: Aetherflux Reservoir
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life for each spell you've cast this turn. Pay 50 life: Aetherflux Reservoir deals 50 damage to any target.

card.name: Altar of Dementia
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Target player mills cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

card.name: Ashnod's Altar
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C}.

card.name: Astral Cornucopia
card.property: Astral Cornucopia enters with X charge counters on it. {T}: Choose a color. Add one mana of that color for each charge counter on Astral Cornucopia.

card.name: Blackblade Reforged
Bone Saw
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Burnished Hart
card.property: {3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Caged Sun
card.property: As Caged Sun enters, choose a color. Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1. Whenever a land's ability causes you to add one or more mana of the chosen color, add one additional mana of that color.

card.name: Chromatic Lantern
card.property: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color." {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Chromatic Star
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Chromatic Star: Add one mana of any color. When Chromatic Star is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Cloud Key
card.property: As Cloud Key enters, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery. Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Defense Grid
card.property: Each spell costs {3} more to cast except during its controller's turn.

card.name: Door to Nothingness
card.property: Door to Nothingness enters tapped. {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Door to Nothingness: Target player loses the game.

card.name: Elsewhere Flask
card.property: When Elsewhere Flask enters, draw a card. Sacrifice Elsewhere Flask: Choose a basic land type. Each land you control becomes that type until end of turn.

card.name: Foundry Inspector
card.property: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Gilded Lotus
card.property: {T}: Add three mana of any one color.

card.name: Goblin Charbelcher
card.property: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Goblin Charbelcher deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to any target. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, Goblin Charbelcher deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Helm of the Host
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a token that's a copy of equipped creature, except the token isn't legendary. That token gains haste. Equip {5}

card.name: Howling Mine
card.property: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if Howling Mine is untapped, that player draws an additional card.

card.name: Ichor Wellspring
card.property: When Ichor Wellspring enters or is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Inspiring Statuary
card.property: Nonartifact spells you cast have improvise. (Your artifacts can help cast those spells. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)

card.name: Ivory Tower
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain X life, where X is the number of cards in your hand minus 4.

card.name: Jalum Tome
card.property: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Journeyer's Kite
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Keening Stone
card.property: {5}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.

card.name: Key to the City
card.property: {T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn. Whenever Key to the City becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Liquimetal Coating
card.property: {T}: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn.

card.name: Lodestone Golem
card.property: Nonartifact spells cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Mazemind Tome
card.property: {T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Scry 1. {2}, {T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Draw a card. When there are four or more page counters on Mazemind Tome, exile it. If you do, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Mesmeric Orb
card.property: Whenever a permanent becomes untapped, that permanent's controller mills a card.

card.name: Millstone
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.

card.name: Mind's Eye
card.property: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Mishra's Bauble
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Bauble: Look at the top card of target player's library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Mox Amber
card.property: {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.

card.name: Mystic Forge
card.property: You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library. {T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.

card.name: Ornithopter
card.property: Flying

card.name: Perilous Vault
card.property: {5}, {T}, Exile Perilous Vault: Exile all nonland permanents.

card.name: Phyrexian Processor
card.property: As Phyrexian Processor enters, pay any amount of life. {4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered.

card.name: Phyrexian Revoker
card.property: As Phyrexian Revoker enters, choose a nonland card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

card.name: Platinum Angel
card.property: Flying You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

card.name: Precursor Golem
card.property: When Precursor Golem enters, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens. Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

card.name: Pristine Talisman
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.

card.name: Psychosis Crawler
card.property: Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Quicksilver Amulet
card.property: {4}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Quietus Spike
Ramos, Dragon Engine
card.property: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ramos, Dragon Engine for each of that spell's colors. Remove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Runechanter's Pike
card.property: Equipped creature has first strike and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Equip {2}

card.name: Scrap Trawler
card.property: Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser mana value.

card.name: Sculpting Steel
card.property: You may have Sculpting Steel enter as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

card.name: Self-Assembler
card.property: When Self-Assembler enters, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Semblance Anvil
card.property: Imprint — When Semblance Anvil enters, you may exile a nonland card from your hand. Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Sigil of Valor
card.property: Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Soul-Guide Lantern
card.property: When Soul-Guide Lantern enters, exile target card from a graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Exile each opponent's graveyard. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Draw a card.

card.name: Springleaf Drum
card.property: {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Staff of Domination
card.property: {1}: Untap Staff of Domination. {2}, {T}: You gain 1 life. {3}, {T}: Untap target creature. {4}, {T}: Tap target creature. {5}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Sundering Titan
card.property: When Sundering Titan enters or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.property: Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {1}

card.name: Sword of the Meek
Thorn of Amethyst
card.property: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Unwinding Clock
card.property: Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

card.name: Well of Lost Dreams
card.property: Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

card.name: Wurmcoil Engine
card.property: Deathtouch, lifelink When Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Phyrexian Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.

card.property: As Adaptive Automaton enters, choose a creature type. Adaptive Automaton is the chosen type in addition to its other types. Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.
